Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Lt. Thomas Cleere to receive certain service credit under a twenty year retirement plan
Summary: Authorizes Lt. Thomas Cleere to change his service credit from the improved career retirement plan to a 20 year retirement plan.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Lt. Thomas Cleere to receive certain service credit under a twenty year retirement plan
